channel.title: New Server, looking for testers and Mods! Dodian based!
channel.description:
Hey guys, this is a great new server running off the popular Dodian client, Here is the link to the client, just open it and extract it all to a file on your desktop, open the file then double click the "run" file.
CLIENT: http://www.mediafire.com/?dgmu2dnei9z
once the clieent loads, make a name and password and under IP put this EXACTLY:
spadesownage.no-ip.org
COME HAVE FUN, WORKING PVP, SKILLING, RARES, SKELETAL
Have fun guys!!!
post all comments and concerns here, your voices will be heard!!!
